mng: age, seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1], seventh in order, letter "G" or roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc, ancient Chinese compass point: 255°, hepta

fifty seventh year G9 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1980 or 2040

seventeenth year G5 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2000 or 2060
